publication.title: Design and Implementation of Context Calculus in the GIPSY Environment
publication.jconf: International Computer Software and Applications Conference

publication.title: Complete Context Calculus Design and Implementation in GIPSY
publication.abstract: This paper presents the integration into the GIPSY of Lucx's context calculus defined in Wan's PhD thesis. We start by defining different types of tag sets, then we explain the concept of context, the types of context and the context calculus operators. Finally, we present how context entities have been abstracted into Java classes and embedded into the GIPSY system.
